description:
Angelo is a hot Latin muscle boy who is into wrestling and cage fighting. He actually avoided any fights for weeks so he wouldn't show up battered and bruised.
He wants to do sports and fitness modeling, but I dunno, he's not real tall, and he's got an "interesting" belly button. He is talking about doing a very high level of fitness modeling, so I am not sure he he can do it. ~sorry~
But, I think he is perfect for us to get eyeful for us!
And frankly, I think with a giant cock like his, he's better suited for porn. Though he of course only wants to bang chicks.
He is pretty stoic during his solo, but he unloads a giant load for us.
Wonder if he will let us suck on it?
title: Angelo - Solo
